code: import*as AlbumApiUtil from"../util/album_util";export var RECEIVE_ALBUM="RECEIVE_ALBUM";export var RECEIVE_ALBUMS="RECEIVE_ALBUMS";export var TOGGLE_ALBUM_LIKE="TOGGLE_ALBUM_LIKE";var receiveAlbum=function receiveAlbum(album){return{type:RECEIVE_ALBUM,album:album};};var receiveAlbums=function receiveAlbums(albums){return{type:RECEIVE_ALBUMS,albums:albums};};var toggleLike=function toggleLike(likeData){return{type:TOGGLE_ALBUM_LIKE,likeData:likeData};};export var fetchAlbum=function fetchAlbum(id){return function(dispatch){return AlbumApiUtil.fetchAlbum(id).then(function(album){dispatch(receiveAlbum(album));});};};export var fetchAlbums=function fetchAlbums(){return function(dispatch){return AlbumApiUtil.fetchAlbums().then(function(albums){dispatch(receiveAlbums(albums));});};};export var searchAlbums=function searchAlbums(search){return function(dispatch){return AlbumApiUtil.searchAlbums(search).then(function(albums){dispatch(receiveAlbums(albums));});};};export var toggleAlbumLike=function toggleAlbumLike(likeData){return function(dispatch){return AlbumApiUtil.toggleAlbumLike(likeData).then(function(likeData){dispatch(toggleLike(likeData));});};};
